2.name: Traveller
2.desc: You lose less vigor from walking.

3.name: Foraging
3.desc: Increase your chance of acquiring more ingredients when foraging plants.

4.name: Hustler
4.desc: You lose less vigor from performing commercial activities.

5.name: Haggler
5.desc: Increase your chance of having a discount when buying or selling items.

6.name: Leatherwork
6.desc: Allow you to craft basic leather-based items.

7.name: Apothecary
7.desc: Allow you to craft basic medicines.
